    • Method Detail

      • getComponent

        public <T extends com.badlogic.ashley.core.Component> T getComponent(java.lang.Class<T> component)
        Internal and simple way of getting Ashley components. This allows you to add your own components (using ZbeEntity.add(component)) without having to create your own ZbeEntity class
        Parameters:
        component - component class to get e.g. ResourceComponent.class
        Returns:
        the instance of the component belonging to this entity

      • collides

        public ZbeEntity collides(ZbeEntity entity,
                 java.lang.String entityType,
                 float x,
                 float y)
        Check if source entity is colliding with any entity of type entityType
        Parameters:
        entity - entity to check collision for
        entityType - entity type to check collisions with
        x - x position of the source entity's bounds
        y - y position of the source entity's bounds
        Returns:
        the collided entity

      • collides

        public ZbeEntity collides(ZbeEntity entity,
                 java.lang.String entityType)
        Check if source entity is colliding with any entity of type entityType. Uses the entity's position for x and y
        Parameters:
        entity - entity to check collision for
        entityType - entity type to check collisions with
        Returns:
        the collided entity
